entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
